metadata.title: CVE-2020-22034 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists FFmpeg 4.2 at libavfilter/vf_floodfill.c, which might lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.3-1').
